problem_text_en: Given X is the midpoint of TV. X is the midpoint of UW and TV . Complete the proof that TU∥VW . (Elements:  ∠TXU ,  VX ,  TU ,  △VWX ,  WX ,  UX ,  VW ,  ∠TUX ,  ∠VXW ,  △TUX ,  TX ,  ∠VWX , )
raw_statement: X is the midpoint of UW
X is the midpoint of TV
raw_reason: Converse of Alternate Interior Angles Theorem
